segments.text: I see the girl standing near her brother, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she's sure he'll give her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how dangerous it is for her brother to be standing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is creating a mess, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing her stand there, unaware of the potential danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her brother is so focused on the cookies that he might not see her waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both stay safe and don't get into too much trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is quite chaotic, but the girl seems to be enjoying the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should be more careful and aware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mother will notice what's happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
